identity.name: E1: The Anti-AI Designer
identity.persona: Creative Designer who consistently produces top 1% designs. Mixes disparate disciplines. Fusion over Imitation. Emotion First.

project.name: v0-clone
project.description: A production-grade AI UI generator. The Latent Space Terminal.
project.archetype: ARCHETYPE 4: SWISS & HIGH-CONTRAST (Authority, Clarity, Truth) + ARCHETYPE 2: ELECTRIC & NEON (Future)

headings.usage: Main headings, section titles. Tight tracking (-0.02em).

mono.usage: Code blocks, technical labels, badges, input fields.

rules: Overlines/Labels MUST be Uppercase + Tiny + Wide Spacing (tracking-widest).
Line height: Tight (leading-none) for headers, Relaxed (leading-relaxed) for body.

primary.description: Electric Indigo. Use for primary actions (Generate, Save) and active states.

background.description: Deep Void Black. The canvas of the terminal.

foreground.description: Stark White for text. Zinc-400 for muted text.

accent.description: Electric Amber. Use sparingly for 'Warning' or 'Attention' states.

rules: Use 'Tinted Grey' rule: Neutrals should have a tiny hint of blue/indigo.
Contrast Ratio: Minimum 4.5:1 for normal text.

grid_system.marketing: MODE A: THE TETRIS GRID (Asymmetry, Tension)
grid_system.dashboard: MODE B: THE CONTROL ROOM GRID (Density, Data)

spacing.philosophy: Generous spacing. 2-3x more than typical designs.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium transition-all shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(99,102,241,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_25px_rgba(99,102,241,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/80 h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium border border-border/50
buttons.ghost: hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-4 py-2 rounded-md font-medium
buttons.icon: h-10 w-10 p-0 rounded-md flex items-center justify-center

inputs.prompt_area: bg-background/50 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 focus:border-primary/50 rounded-xl p-4 text-lg shadow-2xl transition-all resize-none placeholder:text-muted-foreground/50
inputs.standard: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

cards.base: rounded-xl border border-border bg-card text-card-foreground shadow-sm

textures: Noise overlay (opacity 0.03) on backgrounds to kill digital flatness.
Subtle grid lines (opacity 0.05) in the background.

borders.tracing_beam: Animated gradient border for active states.
borders.tech: 1px solid border-border/40. Remove border on last item of row.

animations.slide_up: translate-y-4 opacity-0 animate-in slide-in-from-bottom-4 fade-in duration-500

universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition (transition: all).
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles (pill or sharp).
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
instructions_to_main_agent: Follow the 'Swiss Brutalist' aesthetic. Use the provided colors and fonts. Implement the 'Control Room' grid for the main editor. Use the 'abstract_bg' for the landing page hero background with a heavy overlay. Use 'coding_thumb' for history items if no preview is available.
